headline: 3M Stock Falls. The CEO Has Been Too Successful.
summary: Deutsche Bank analyst Nicole DeBlase downgraded shares of material technology company  3M  to Hold from Buy on Monday.  The stock has just worked.  Coming into the week, 3M stock had gained more than 60% since DeBlase upgraded it in July 2024.

headline: Is L3Harris Technologies Stock Underperforming the Nasdaq?
summary: Despite L3Harris Technologies’ underperformance relative to the Nasdaq Composite on a YTD basis, analysts remain cautiously optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
